page.title: 04Nature Trail (Brockhampton)
page.content: The{Woodland Walk}is on the Brockhampton estate that belongs to the{National Trust.}As I am only just across the road from there I enjoy going for walks in the wood.There are {two}routes{red}route is one mile and the{blue}one is one and a half miles long.To start the walk you go through a kissing gate in the stone wall and then follow the blue or red arrows.You are now amongst all different kinds of trees,like{Oak,Beech,Larch and Pine and many more.A wooded steep bank is descended for 400 metres to a stream where I like to paddle.As you climb up the other side you can see wildlife like{Mice,Sqirrels and Rabbits}and many wild flowers.At last you come to a large pool witch is is named{Lawn {Pool}as you leave another steep bank has to be to be climbed and the walk is over.
